001package reversi;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.Optional;
006
007public class Judge extends Object {
008    private Table table;
009    private List<Player> players;
010    private Boolean placePiece;
011    private Integer index;
012
013    public Judge(Table aTable, List<Player> player) {
014        table = aTable;
015        players = player;
016        placePiece = false;
017        index = 0;
018        this.initialize();
019        return;
020    }
021
022    public void initialize() {
023        Integer aMaxColumn = table.getMaxColumn();
024        Integer aMaxRow = table.getMaxRow();
025        Integer aColumn = aMaxColumn / 2;
026        Integer aRow = aMaxRow / 2;
027
028        table.initialize();
029        players.get(0).placePiece(aColumn, aRow);
030        players.get(0).placePiece(aColumn - 1, aRow - 1);
031        players.get(1).placePiece(aColumn - 1, aRow);
032        players.get(1).placePiece(aColumn, aRow - 1);
033        placePiece = true;
034
035        return;
036    }
037
038    public void placePieceAction(Integer aColumn, Integer aRow) {
039        Player aPlayer = this.getPlayer();
040        if (table.isPlacePiece(aPlayer, aColumn, aRow)) {
041            aPlayer.placePiece(aColumn, aRow);
042            if (isEnd())
043                this.changeWinPlayer();
044            else
045                this.changePlayer();
046        }
047        return;
048    }
049
050    public Player getPlayer(Integer aColor){
051        return players.get(aColor-1);
052    }
053
054    public Boolean isEnd() {
055        if (table.getEmptyCount() == 0)
056            return true;
057        return false;
058    }
059
060    public void changePlayer() {
061        index++;
062        if (index == players.size())
063            index = 0;
064        return;
065    }
066
067    public void changeWinPlayer() {
068        System.out.println("ok");
069        List<Integer> aList = new ArrayList<>();
070        players.forEach(item -> aList.add(item.getCount()));
071        Optional<Integer> max = aList.stream().max(Integer::compareTo);
072        index = aList.indexOf(max.get());
073        placePiece = false;
074        return;
075    }
076
077    public Table getTable() {
078        return table;
079    }
080
081    public Boolean getPlacePiece() {
082        return placePiece;
083    }
084
085    public Player getPlayer() {
086        return players.get(index);
087    }
088
089    public Integer getPlayerColor(){
090        Player aPlayer = getPlayer();
091        return aPlayer.getColor();
092    }
093
094    public List<Player> getPlayers(){
095        return players;
096    }
097}
